hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
source /home/test/.bashrc #Set the below parameters manually package_name="mariadb" published_version="10.2.13"
cat /etc/redhat-release
source /home/test/.bashrc #Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles11.x/12.x, Ub16.x/17.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then available_version=$(sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi
SOURCE_ROOT=`pwd` source /home/test/.bashrc sudo yum install -y git wget cmake gcc gcc-c++ hostname make ncurses-devel bison tar boost-devel check-devel openssl-devel perl-CPAN 'perl(Test::More)' wget https://github.com/MariaDB/server/archive/mariadb-10.2.13.tar.gz tar xzf mariadb-10.2.13.tar.gz
cd $SOURCE_ROOT git clone git://github.com/MariaDB/mariadb-connector-c.git cd mariadb-connector-c git checkout v3.0.2 cd .. cp -r mariadb-connector-c/* server-mariadb-10.2.13/libmariadb/
sed -i '231d' server-mariadb-10.2.13/libmariadb/include/mariadb_com.h sed -i '231 a\#define SERVER_STATUS_IN_TRANS_READONLY 8192' server-mariadb-10.2.13/libmariadb/include/mariadb_com.h sed -i '231 a\#define SERVER_SESSION_STATE_CHANGED 16384' server-mariadb-10.2.13/libmariadb/include/mariadb_com.h sed -i '231 a\#define SERVER_STATUS_ANSI_QUOTES 32768' server-mariadb-10.2.13/libmariadb/include/mariadb_com.h
##Build, configure, install and execute test cases cd $SOURCE_ROOT/server-mariadb-10.2.13 BUILD/autorun.sh ./configure make sudo make install
sudo useradd mysql #sudo groupadd mysql cd /usr/local/mysql sudo chmod -R o+rwx .
# Start Mysql server sudo scripts/mysql_install_db --user=mysql sleep 20s sudo cp support-files/mysql.server /etc/init.d/mysql sudo /usr/local/mysql/bin/mysqld_safe --user=mysql & sleep 30s sudo bin/mysqladmin version --user=mysql
cd $SOURCE_ROOT/server-mariadb-10.2.13 make test
###Build galara for clustering.... cd $SOURCE_ROOT wget http://downloads.sourceforge.net/project/scons/scons/2.3.4/scons-2.3.4-1.noarch.rpm sudo rpm -i scons-2.3.4-1.noarch.rpm git clone git://github.com/codership/galera.git cd galera git checkout release_25.3.21 scons strict_build_flags=0 --config=force sudo cp garb/garbd /usr/local/sbin/ sudo cp libgalera_smm.so /usr/local/lib64/ sudo /sbin/ldconfig -v
